Entries.64780021/t 610 2550: continue/28 30/farmer 27 30 0 Maru 29 25 3 Harvey 0 0 0/addConversationTopic MaruPregnant 13/addMailReceived Pregnant1_Maru/addMailReceived HospitalOutfit/skippable/pause 1250/viewport move 0 -5 1275/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Maru "#$b# I'm not feeling very well, @... $s"/pause 500/showframe Maru 26/pause 1000/emote Maru 28/pause 500/speak Maru "Can you take me to go see Harvey?$s"/viewport -100 100/changeLocation Hospital/changeSprite Maru Winter/changePortrait Maru Winter/viewport 5 5/warp farmer 2 5/warp Maru 3 5/showFrame Maru 4/warp Harvey 5 8/move Harvey 0 -3 3 false/speak Harvey "I must say Maru, I'm surprised you didn't recognize the symptoms of your ailment.$h"/emote farmer 8/emote Maru 8/speak Harvey "Nausea? Slight fever? Fatigue? #$b# Maru, you're pregnant!$h"/playmusic musicboxsong/emote farmer 16/speak Maru "Oh!#$b#I guess it's harder to recognize the symptoms when you're the one experiencing them.$h#$b#@, we're going to have a baby! Entries.64780043/e 64780021/n Pregnant1_Maru/A M: sappypiano/-100 -100/Maru 19 12 2 farmer 20 12 0 Harvey 5 15 2/addConversationTopic MaruBabySleep/addMailReceived HospitalOutfit1/faceDirection farmer 3/positionOffset Maru -25 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Maru "@, are you awake? #$b# I think the baby is coming! $l"/changeLocation Hospital/changeSprite Maru Winter/changePortrait Maru Winter/showFrame Maru 0/showFrame farmer 6 true/ ambientLight 150 150 150/viewport 14 11 true/pause 1000/speak Maru "Thanks for getting me here so quickly. #$b# I've read up a lot on child birth, but that doesn't make it any less terrifying...$s #$b# I know it's a natural occurence, but so many things could still go wrong.$s"/pause 500/emote Maru 28/speak Maru "Do you remember what I said when I turned on MarILDA? #$b# That I made her to take care of my mom and dad?$s"/pause 500/emote Maru 40/pause 500/speak Maru "I wanted to make sure that they would be okay once I left the house... but also if anything happened to me. $s"/showFrame Maru 26/emote farmer 8/shake Maru 500/pause 500/speak Maru "Ever since my machine shocked you, I started realizing how dangerous my inventions can be. $s #$b# And the last thing I want to do is to have %kid1 grow up without a parent. $s"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/speak Maru "What's that? $s"/pause 500/showFrame Maru 0/speak Maru "Hmm... that is a good point. #$b# The mines are surely more dangerous than my inventions, and you aren't scared to go down there. $h"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/speak Maru "You're right, @. #$b# I can do this... as long as you're holding my hand the whole time.$h"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 35 true/positionOffset farmer -25 0/emote farmer 20 true/emote Maru 20/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100 true/warp Harvey 21 12/faceDirection Harvey 3/warp farmer 20 11/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Harvey "It's time for the baby to come, @. Maru is going to need to start pushing now."/pause 1500/speak Harvey "That's it, Maru! Just one more push!"/addTemporaryActor {{BabyorBaby_Dark}} 23 15 20 12 2 False Character/positionOffset {{BabyorBaby_Dark}} 0 -65/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 500/message "Your baby's cry pierces the air."/pause 500/speak Harvey "Well, your baby's lungs are certainly strong and healthy!$h"/fade/viewport 18 11 true/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 2000/speak Maru "Oh, @. %kid1 is perfect. Just like you.$l"/emote farmer 20 true/emote Harvey 32 false/pause 1500/viewport -100 -100 true/message "Your family just got a little bigger! Time to take your new baby home!"/pause 1000/end
